go_further: Do you really want to go further?
aboutDescription: Hey, I am passionate programist. I write code since long time using many different technologies.Beginning from back-end: PHP, by: Symphony, Laravel to Node.js. I like to think, make analysis and also spend much time on contemplations. Sometimes I do also front-end projects and I have a lot of fun while working on styles or animation scripting. My specialization is Angular, but I am also good with React. Some time ago I went crazy about games developing aswell. Check below and try one of games made by me. I love programming at all so I can easily find myself in working on all possible technologies: back-end, front-end, mobile and even desktop apps.
name: Name
